website_summaries.verdict: All the Hallmark quality you expect at a significant savings.
pros: Set of 24 cards and envelopes comes in a beautiful storage box with dividers
Box has extra room for additional cards
Cards come embellished with pom-poms, ribbons, sequins, and other various design elements
A mix of high-quality blank and message-filled cards

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cards, but not practical for mailing
customer_reviews.text: Cards are beautiful..but.. every one will require extra postage if I mail them. Buyer beware. read the small print(if there was some) that extra postage may be required. Because it certainly will as there is added effects like beads, wooden carved items etc. Just saying. Beautiful handwork, just not practical for mailing(which is what I do)
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: HUGE box! Great for storage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box, plus about 75 other cards to add to it, and this box can hold all of them. I'm 100% impressed. I've wanted this product since I first saw an advertisement for it on TV about 15 years ago, and it has definitely met my expectations. All the cards are great, cute cards I would have bought myself in a Hallmark store, and I love just being able to pull one out when I remember that it's someone's birthday today. I would recommend this product to anyone who loves sending or storing cards. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: ShMeDa

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot for your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing in quality and value. These cards have embellishments, and they’re not white and plain once you open them. The colors on the inside match the outside and each card has a different font. Quality is excellent, and if you bought one of these at the store, it would cost $4.00+. The box the cards come in has a magnetic clasp closure. There’s also dividers. The dividers are printed on sturdy cardstock-like paper. I laminated my dividers to make them even sturdier. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality cards in a beautiful box
customer_reviews.text: I don't like bying a giant box with the same cards, same pictures, same words. I don't like spending hours in stores to pick the right cards either. This box was perfect for me. Handing them to different coworkers and family members is not awkward- like Uncle Joe here's copy#1 Aunt Jane copy#2... It arrived earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the most beautiful Christmas cards I've ever gotten my hands on
customer_reviews.text: These were, by far, the most beautiful Christmas cards I've ever gotten my hands on. Each design was unique, colorful, and gorgeous. The three dimensional designs and quality craftsmanship made these cards look way more expensive than they were and they all came with their own protective cover cards, envelopes, and seal stickers. I got so many compliments from their recipients. Even the box they came in was fantastic. I saved it to use for a decoration next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Lyrical

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Card Collection
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful collection of high quality cards, and the box it comes in is beautiful as well. The value is incredible. I've seen embellished cards in the store but I've always found them to be cost-restrictive for me since I'm on a fixed income, but here I got 24 cards and a case in which to keep them for only $20!!!! Amazing value. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SunKira

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful box of Cristmas Cards!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cards! Excellent detail. These cards are made with heavy paper for a quality feel. They definitely look high end. These are the best cards I've seen in years. Not that it matters for the friends receiving the cards, but the box they come in is also very nice. The writing inside is done well too. All around great deal for these cards!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.P. Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who stress over cards for all occasions!
customer_reviews.text: I love this idea and never would have thought of it myself. I’m always stressed around birthdays, holidays, and occasions remembering cards. This box gets you off to the right start with plenty of birthday cards and a smaller assortment of other cards. The dividers inside allow for easy access and organization. You can buy your own cards and sort as needed. The construction of the box itself is strong and beautiful. This would make a great hostess gift!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, birthday card heavy, great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous from some reviews of quality, but these cards are gorgeous, nice weight, and have nice envelopes. Each card is wrapped individually in plastic and comes with a sheet to place between the design and envelope to protect it during mailing. There are mostly birthday cards, which is a plus for me as that’s what I need most. Also comes with a sturdy case with files for easy storage and organizing by event or month. Would be nice if the case had magnetic closure, but that’s my only negative if I’m really looking for something, for the price point this is a great deal. I will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Objective

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a very usable assortment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom. She’s 90 and due to covid, is not venturing out. This assortment allows her to choose cards for family and friends herself. The selection is perfect, most being for birthdays. Many of the birthday cards are less specific and could be used to celebrate a variety of occasions. They are high quality and individually wrapped. Mom is excited about the box and being able to organize the cards as she adds to her collection. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sportster9

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The cards are pretty and heavy/well made as you would expect from Hallmark, however the sayings/sentiment inside the cards leaves a lot to be desired. They are very basic and in line with what you would expect from cheap assorted cards - not normal Hallmark quality. The box they came in is very nice and heavy duty with a magnetic closure. Love the idea of picking individual cards for each person I am sending to, just wish they were standard "Hallmark" quality sentiments/verses inside. Envelopes are good quality and they include the small gold seals.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Decent value if you need birthday cards and don’t care about the card holder box.
customer_reviews.text: My box arrived damaged on the top but the shipping box was fine. The box was what I was really looking forward to having so I had a dedicated place to hold extra cards. The card assortment only has 1 baby, 1 wedding, 1 blank, 2 sympathy, 2 thinking of you. All the rest are birthday. This is not quite what I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect box for storing cards at home.
customer_reviews.text: I love this box and how you can organize cards by the occasion. The cards are nice as well, as expected from Hallmark. My only issue with this box is that there isn't as much variety as I'd hoped. It says it has all these different cards for different occasions... but what it doesn't say (or maybe I didn't research enough before purchase) is that you only get one or two cards in most categories. Otherwise...most of the cards included are birthday. So if that's what you mainly want, this will be perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: calileo

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL cards with awesome box
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed when I received the all occasion box. I'm in charge of all the greeting cards at work and it usually leaves me running out all the time for expensive greeting cards. I decided to order this kit so that I can add to it. Side note: I don't usually buy expensive cards, usually I just stick to the 2 for $1 at the dollar store. However, I love all the tabs to organize the cards and the ones that you receive in the kit are beautiful! I am very impressed. Definitely would recommend purchasing. The box and dividers that come with it are awesome, so you can add to your collection and keep everything sorted nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Berrios

customer_reviews.title: The quality and packaging blew my mind
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars I would. Each card is beautiful, unique and comes in its own protective sleeve. There are added sequins, glitter and beautiful cutouts to each card. I am blown away by this. At the store, these cards would sell for $3-$5 apiece. This value is UNREAL! I simply can not get over this. It comes in its own, beautiful box as well and I just can not say enough about it. GET IT! You will NOT regret it. Not for one second.
customer_reviews.author: Iwona K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box to store all your cards!
customer_reviews.text: Hallmark Assortment Card Box is a beautiful box that makes storing greeting cards easy! The floral box is beautiful! This set includes 14 birthday cards; 2 blank cards, thinking of you cards, and sympathy cards; and 1 baby card, wedding card, thank you card, and congrats card. This box keeps your cards organized and in one place. It also makes it easy when you need a last minute card! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Cute cards and box with dividers, worth the price & will definitely use. You did have to categorize the cards into the tabs yourself but it was good to individually look at each card supplied (they’re also individually wrapped). 14 are birthday cards & the other 10 are a spread out through the remaining categories. Quality cards with reusable organizing box (with dividers). Would buy again for myself or a gift.
customer_reviews.author: JSP85

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value in these high quality cards
customer_reviews.text: I love sending cards, but I don't like spending 3-5 dollars on each one. I also like to have something on hand so I'm not rushing around at the last minute. I ordered these and could not be more impressed. The cards themselves are very nice and there is a good selection. The bus is very sturdy with tabs to keep your cards organized. I love these so much I'm going to buy a few additional as gifts. Get these, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the embellishments on these Christmas cards- jingle bells, glitter and pompoms! The box they come in is substantial and can be re-used for gifts. There was a good mix of sentiments with a couple that were odd but will probably work for someone on our list. I mailed 7 out and glad I went to the USPS since they required extra postage as the cards indicated might be the case. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: Go get these
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy and having a box of good cards around is a great idea. Why Wait to go to a drug store and buy a card late and expensive. What the heck have we been doing to ourselfs for years. I had one of these boxes sent to my mom. I have birthdays on my phone calendar three days ahead of time. You will be thought of as a sensitive and thoughtful dude
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy II

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seniors Bday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My Mom was turning 93. What do you get a 93 yr. old? Cards.....Yep....this assortment. Since COVID has her on lockdown, she cannot go to the store to get the cards she loves sending each month for birthdays, "hellos", and occasionally sympathy cards. This set fits the bill, and she loved the quality of the cards themselves. She called them, "Beautiful!" What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: peter williams

customer_reviews.title: My mom in assisted living can now give her friends cards!
customer_reviews.text: My mom is in assisted living and seldom has opportunities to go shopping. She asked for birthday cards so she could give them to her friends there so I purchased these and had them sent to her. She loves the card and loves the box they came in, too! She can hardly wait till someone has a birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Goe

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for money!
customer_reviews.text: I have never specifically gone back in to Amazon to review a product, but this so exceeded my expectations that I had to leave a review. These are really nice, really high quality cards, the kind you pay $5.99-$9.99 for individually. In addition to that, the box that comes with it to organize the cards is incredibly nice - I would have paid $25 just for the organizational box! It fits all the cards in the set and many many more beyond that. It's huge and can fit cards that are odd sizes and shapes as well. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deepa Galaiya

customer_reviews.title: Good value set
customer_reviews.text: The box the cards come in is very cute! The set also comes with Hallmark crown stickers to seal the envelope so I think that is a plus. The cards are not made from a heavy hard stock you would traditional get from Hallmark card, but they are good nonetheless. This set is a great way to get a variety of cards without getting the same 24 cards. That makes is super easy to use the cards for next Christmas ! Overall good quality just don’t expect heavy card stock.
customer_reviews.author: njpm

customer_reviews.title: Unique and striking Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: Wow these cards are STUNNING!!!!!! And the box they come in is super high quality! I can’t believe I snagged these cards for such a value!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, first the box the cards come in is beautiful. The cards are so pretty, and very good quality. You definitely get your moneys worth with these pretty cards, Don't hesitate, Christmas is almost here. Sometimes on Amazon I'm disappointed, but not in this case, much better than I anticipated. Why are you still reading this? Purchase these beautiful cards, and yes I am a real customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but....
customer_reviews.text: The cards are beautiful and a nice assortment. They also come in a beautiful box which can easily be reused. (I put all my loose cookie cutters in the box from last year.) My only complaint is I purchased these cards last year, and again this year. I was hoping the cards would be different, but they are the same as last years' cards--so that is my only complaint. Otherwise, they are really nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Q

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these cards. They are great quality, very colorful, and a nice variety. Having the box to store them is perfect. We have lots of birthdays, weddings, etc etc and now I always have cards on hand. The best part is the price! So affordable.
customer_reviews.author: BK Shah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards and sturdy box
customer_reviews.text: This box with Hallmark cards is an amazing value! The cards are beautiful and the box and dividers are sturdy. I am old school and love to send a personal note. Now not only do I have a wonderful way to organize cards but have plenty of gorgeous ones to send. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne G

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made box and cards. Organized
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality product. Cards are very affordable and nicer than what you would get in a store for even $4 each. They come in a very nice, sturdy box that is organized with dividers for different sections. There is plenty of extra room so you can organize other cards you might have on hand. I am extremely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: These are Real Cards with the quality that you expect from Hallmark. There are quite a few Birthday cards. They are so nice that you can use them for children as well as adults! I also received a box with dividers to make it easy to keep my cards separated by type and readily accessible. The storage box is so nice that I keep it on the desk in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Mur3

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these cards! The floral box is very pretty and sturdy and will be great to keep more cards in. The quality of the cards is what you would expect from Hallmark and you can't beat the price when you consider what just one birthday card costs in the store. This would make a great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful High Quality Cards - Will Cost .70 to Mail Within the USA
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Hallmark boxed, and single, card purchaser for over 30 years. As soon as I saw this Christmas boxed set, knew I had to have them. Loved everything about them even the messages inside each card. Every card is different. Mailed every single one of them. Definitely use the lightweight, cardboard insert that comes with each card to protect during mailing. All US addressed cards were .70 to mail (2019.)
customer_reviews.author: K. Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collection of greeting cards. I like Hallmark Cards to begin with and couldn't pass up this deal. I was running low on cards and decided to purchase this collection on Prime Day at a great price. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't look too carefully when I ordered these, so I just expected an average box of average cards... when they arrived I was super pleasantly surprised first by how beautiful and sturdy the box is (will be keeping that long after the cards are gone!) and how absolutely gorgeous the cards themselves are. They are each unique and absolutely stunning. Compared to buying 24 handmade cards individually, the value for the money is fantastic. Really something to be said for USA made pride in a quality product. Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: plutos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards!
customer_reviews.text: The cards in the box are very well made and exactly what I wanted. During the pandemic I have not gone out as much as before, so having these cards have helped a lot! I like how they are organized for easy access to a particular kind of message.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards
customer_reviews.text: Everyone I gave these cards to had great things to say about them. They could all tell these cards were made with a better stock. Will probably buy again next year if still around. The box they came in is nice, but I used every single card and had no use for it after. But if you're crafty you might find something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. H.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: These are all the exact same thank you cards. Description is very misleading and I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SarahAlthea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: These cards are so amazing. I got them for my mom be cause she wanted to get Christmas cards to send out, but she’s bed bound and can’t get around to pick out cards herself. So I ordered these for her and it was PPERFECT! She loved them so much she wanted to keep some for herself haha. Super high quality and at first i thought was a little pricey but when i did the math they’re only a FRACTION of the price if i was to buy them in stores one by one... loved the cards so much we bought a knot her box of other holidays... highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Basketball dad

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Box is larger than expected and well made.(expecting more like flimsy cardboard box, this is not like that at all!) Cards are individually wrapped and assortment was great. I purchased another assortment for half the price but those were nothing compared to these cards. These are truly the cards you would purchase at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful card collection.  Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with the assortment and quality of these cards. The various cutouts and embellishments add to the outstanding designs and beautifully printed colors. I have bought boxed cards assortment before but nothing comparable to the set included in the box. The dividers are printed on both sides, offering the choice of filing the cards by category or by months of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Had high expectations given the reviews, but it still exceeded expectations! Really nice storage box, lovely high quality cards, nice selection. Given that you could easily spend $5+ for a card of this quality, it's a great value. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Indygirl

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cards and box
customer_reviews.text: I am huge fan of quality of Hallmark cards and these didn't disappoint. Nice variety and the box is sturdy and holds a lot and love the dividers. So much cheaper than buying one card at store and paying around $7 for one card.. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleMomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of greeting cards
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cards and less expensive than in a card shop. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is the selection. There were a lot of birthday cards and only one each of thank you card, sympathy card, congratulations card, and blank card. Otherwise, a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great value and comes in a storage box - heavy on birthday cards
customer_reviews.text: While I would have liked to have seen a better variety of cards (too many birthday cards compared to others), each card is well-decorated. I am happy to be giving them out. Also, great value! Comes in a pretty and durable storage box.
customer_reviews.author: T. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Prime Day purchase!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these cards!! The hard file box is awesome and I keep all the cards in one organized location (including the pile I had accumulated prior to purchasing these). The value was incredible and these cards....! They are beautiful. Mostly birthday cards, but an assortment of other occasions as well.
customer_reviews.author: kristyg

customer_reviews.title: Great cards
customer_reviews.text: The cards are all different and come with a protection card to keep them from being crushed in the envelopes. At the end of writing all my cards, I now a fanatic box to keep all my doo-dads in!
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN A ROSS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: A great buy! Needed a sympathy card while on lockdown so I thought I’d buy this package in case I needed any other cards while stuck at home. The cards are beautiful and great for a lot of occasions. The box is very pretty and sturdy too. Great for card storage. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, beautiful cards!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, just beautiful cards! I'm so excited to have found these! Super high quality, stunning cards! Love them so much, I bought a 2nd box of them, and will buy more! Also bought a box of the birthday cards that are just as wonderful! Just awesome, beautiful cards!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I have ever been so excited about greeting cards. I have been telling everyone I know about this box lol. These are beautiful high quality cards! What a deal! I am so glad to have these on hand when needed.
customer_reviews.author: E. stjames

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality cards, each one distinct and beautifully designed. I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box. Each cards is individually wrapped in a clear wrap, with no two cards alike. Classy, elegant, beautiful cards. I would definitely purchase again. (Box is nice and sturdy too.)
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These cards arrived in a beautiful, reusable box and were just perfect! The cards were individually wrapped and carefully packaged. The quality of the designs was topnotch and I could not be more thrilled with this purchase. Nicest cards I've sent in a long time, and worth every penny! I would order them again next year!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The reviews are right, pick it up
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this set of cards. My husband's family is a very card-heavy family--it's not a holiday without a card and a nice note inside. At $6 a card from Target, that really adds up. The birthday cards alone I know we'll use up quickly and just after a few occasions, this set has paid for itself. What I really like about these cards is that they look and feel expensive--not like some cheap set of cards you'd get in a box of 12. They're vibrant and colorful. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Buy them! You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these cards. People that received them also like them. They are a great value. I also ordered a 2nd box!! I send out a lot of birthday wishes and these do just fine!!!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.Tuck

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this to my family as soon as I received it! The box is sturdy and has a magnetic top. The box and cards are well made. Great value! The majority of the cards are birthday cards, only one or two for the other occasions, which makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards@great price!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are absolutely beautiful! There us a,nice selection for various occasions-the price was so reasonable,especially for Hallmark cards-so convenient to have- no need to run out to the store- Highly recommend-
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal this Christmas—Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Total steal—buying again ASAP. These are the best quality cards I’ve ever had for Christmas—awesome variety, dimensional, bells (like REAL ringing bells), and lots of other enhancements. Extremely nice and comes with a great stationary case. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: linda mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: These are beautifully made cards
customer_reviews.text: These are beautifully made cards. Very happy to be sending them out. Be aware extra postage is needed due to the fact hat they are raised not flat. About 12 cents I think.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Awesome cards!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Hallmark cards are awesome! Each one is beautifully made, high quality and individually wrapped in plastic. They come in a beautiful, sturdy keepsake box with removable marked dividers so you can keep them organized. I highly recommend!!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Albuquerque shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I needed cards during this Pandemic, so I looked to Amazon and found this assortment. They are beautiful cards and come in a beautiful box with tabs for different occasions. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and thoughtfully packaged
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these cards exceeded my expectations. These are very sturdy and beautiful. Some cards have jewels and 3-D pieces on the front cover. Each card is individually wrapped in cellophane with the envelope. The organizer box is terrific! I will be purchasing more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards
customer_reviews.text: These cards are very nicely designed, heavy weight, and excellent quality. Perfect assortment for those who find it hard to get out to purchase cards. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT cards!  SUPER DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: These are the cards that would cost you $6-$9 EACH! This is a killer deal! I hope they'll have the same deal on DIFFERENT cards for next year's birthdays!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great value for Hallmark's Beauiful Holiday Cards
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging of the cards ... the sturdy box presentation in a clear wrap - very neat and from past experience I know they are well received by friends and family. Thank you Amazon for carrying the best of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna_050

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Assortment!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These cards are just beautiful, many decorated or 3-D colorful, fine designs in the best Hallmark tradition and quality. The distribution is fine too; lots of birthday ones, just a few of the other categories. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTee

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully detailed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous cards!!! My only complaint is I wish there were more variety packs I could order online, or even “birthday” packs, “thank you” packs, etc. because these are soooo beautifully crafted, it puts the other cards in my collection to shame!
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: These cards were very beautiful I think I would buy them again I wanted to order two sets but I accidentally ordered just one I regret it because now they cost seven dollars more they are worth a more!!! these cost Way more at the store individually and they are handmade they’re beautiful I would buy again......just buy them you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Yesi Avila

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these cards is amazing. Now I'm not a fan of glitter, and most all the cards have some on them, but they are all beautiful. At less than a dollar a card, you can't beat these.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pass this up!! All around excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my favorite Amazon purchased ever. Well worth the money and covers almost every possible occasion you would need a card for. Well made and comes in a lovely box with tabs to sort the cards. I will be purchasing another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Prepared
customer_reviews.text: I adore all of my Hallmark cards. They are sturdy and very well designed. All of the messages are perfect and not over the top or odd. The box that comes with the set of cards is also very well made and lovely! I enjoy having the whole set and I feel prepared. I’m on oxygen and during this corona virus pandemic I cannot leave my apartment so what a relief to have what I need. Thank you Hallmark and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd year buying these. They are beautiful. Only reason 4 stars instead of 5 is because some cards are so thick they require extra postage. It means a trip to the post office to determine this before you send cards.
customer_reviews.author: Cck

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection
customer_reviews.text: The card set is good quality and worth the money. Be aware that many of the cards require extra postage. (They have embellishments.)
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE these cards!!!
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the prettiest Christmas cards EVER!! Each card is beautifully crafted with 3D themes and there are different sizes to fit any need. I am going to order a second set just in case I can't find them next year!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Therese

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards
customer_reviews.text: Lots of beautiful cards. I was able to use most of them. There were a couple that were just plain distasteful & I would not send, but most I liked. Comes with sticker seals. Each card is in a plastic sleeve to protect it. Some of the cards come with an extra piece of paper to protect the decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Jrook3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The cards are very nice! I was impressed with each card (with its coordinating envelope) being individually wrapped in plastic to protect them. The box makes it perfect for organizing and also adding your own cards, too!
customer_reviews.author: Username_not_found

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again , hopping that is a a year or so away
customer_reviews.text: Bulb light at dust and came on at dawn like the were suppose to do, the regular deal on post went out ever 2 years and light went on way to early and way to late in morning
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my elderly mother. She loves to send cards. The cards a well made, sturdy and the best part, for my mom, is they are not likely to be duplicated to those she sends them to.
customer_reviews.author: B. Poshard

customer_reviews.title: Great selection, High quality
customer_reviews.text: This was such a surprise. Great Hallmark cards in a nice keepsake box. I’m about to reorder. Cards are pretty much gender neutral so I’ve used them for both men and women.
customer_reviews.author: Grammer

customer_reviews.title: Get These!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Cards have perfect messages . I really enjoy sending cards . You know how it feels for someone to think of you, so I love to send a little love. These are perfect! God Bless
customer_reviews.author: Brave

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful designs! All different messages inside!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful Christmas cards! I love that the messages were all different inside. All the designs were different... just beautiful! Worth the money if you’re into giving cards that are meaningful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ashley Wightman

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: This is the second box I have purchased. I love having cards on hand for birthdays and such. These are great quality and the variety of cards is good. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 sets & will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered 2 sets of these and LOVE them. Perfect to have on hand for many occasions. Very high quality, well made, standard sized cards. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila T.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards and storage box
customer_reviews.text: These cards are awesome! The value is great and cards are very well made and sturdy. I love the storage box, it’s cute and also very sturdy, can hold a lot of additional cards
customer_reviews.author: Meg G.

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely gorgeous cards! There isn’t a single dud in the group. Each one is so adorable and they all have great little messages inside. I am blown away by these Christmas cards!
customer_reviews.author: C. Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Amazing find
customer_reviews.text: When someone wrote this card assortment exceeding their expectations, they were right! I'm very surprised and so happy I found this card set and at this price. Well worth the money and the cards are high quality, unique, and arrive in a lovely box. Gold colored Hallmark "Crown" stickers are included inside, as well, to use in sealing your envelopes. Adds a nice touch. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jmprime

customer_reviews.title: Hallmark cards AND a box to hold cards in
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise to get not only the Hallmark cards , but a box to hold all cards in. My old one was looking shabby so I was more than pleased. Ordered another for a girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Willman

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a real adult
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to buy a few cards to help fill my time while quarantined and this exceeded my expectations. The cards are really beautiful as is the box they are kept in! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had received them all
customer_reviews.text: I only received half of the cards...the ones that I did get are awesome. I received 11 Birthday and 1 Anniversary.
customer_reviews.author: *3 J's momma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: All the cards were beautifully crafted and most of them came with a sturdy sheet of thick paper to protect the decorations on the front of the cards for posting. High-quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Christmas Cards
customer_reviews.text: The cards were beautiful and in a very lovely reusable box with a magnetic clip. Each card was different from the others, allowing the selection of just the right card for each recipient.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Hush

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cards and set u p
customer_reviews.text: I am handicapped and can't get out to buy cards. These are beautiful and some can be made very personal for family and close friends. I only use a few at a time so I'll have some for next year as well. Packaging is great as well as the box they stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom because she was constantly asking me to go get cards for her. They are beautiful! I like them so much I’m going to order some for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Sommers

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: This box was so much better than I expected. These were not just generic, boring cards like you typically get in boxed sets. These are NICE!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: RV Living

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality cards from Hallmark!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this box of Hallmark cards and they are absolutely beautiful! The photos provided in the ad do not do them justice. Each one is individually wrapped in cellophane and embellished in some way. High quality, brightly colored and unique. Just what you'd expect from Hallmark and an exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gist

customer_reviews.title: Hallmark Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: Cards were all very nice and I received a lot of compliments on them. I saw other reviews stating they needed extra postage, but I sent them all with the regular Christmas Stamp. I am only giving them 4 stars as they were a bit pricey, but they were nice
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing! Amazing value and quality! Recommend for anyone who likes to be prepared. No more running to the store for overpriced cards!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Too many birthday cards 🙁.
customer_reviews.text: These cards are very pretty but I'm disappointed that out of the 24 cards 14 were birthday cards. More than half of the box. I was expecting more variety. Only 1 for baby, 1 blank, 2 thinking of you etc.. The purpose of my purchase was to have a variety of cards at home for different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Matos

customer_reviews.title: Great detail, price and product!
customer_reviews.text: These cards are excellent! I am purchasing different boxed sets from different companies for a Christmas card exchange and these are the first to arrive. They are good in size and each card is different with little articulate details. I am considering purchasing another box for the card exchange! Great value for the brand and amount. Highly recommend! The pictures online do not do these cards justice, so keep that in mind 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Loved these cards and they came in a really nice box with organizer tabs. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Organization
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to have on hand. It comes with a great selection of cards for multiple occasions. The box is actually pretty enough to leave out. There are folders inside to help organize. It’s a great product and I have really enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Topham

product_meta.title: Hallmark Pack of 24 Handmade Assorted Boxed Greeting Cards, Modern Floral—Birthday Cards, Baby Shower Cards, Wedding Cards, Sympathy Cards, Thinking of You Cards, Thank You Cards
product_meta.description: Stock up for celebrations and events throughout the year with this set of individually-wrapped greeting cards with coordinating envelopes. Storage box features a magnetic closure and reversible dividers to keep cards organized by occasion or by month. Each card is individually crafted with special embellishments to elevate any heartfelt message. The Hallmark brand is widely recognized as the very best for greeting cards, gift wrap, and more. For more than 100 years, Hallmark has been helping its customers make everyday moments more beautiful and celebrations more joyful.
feature_bullets: Fun and festive boxed set contains everything you need to celebrate throughout the year: 24 individually-wrapped greeting cards with coordinating envelopes, a storage box, and reversible organizational dividers.
Every card is individually crafted with different embellishments and graphics, making this box an incredible deal. Total value of entire pack is $120! A great gift for anyone who loves to send cards.
24 premium cards showcasing warm, heart-felt wishes and hand-embellished ribbons, pom-poms, sequins, and other attachments make any recipient feel extra special.

This set includes 14 birthday cards; 2 blank cards, thinking of you cards, and sympathy cards; and 1 baby card, wedding card, thank you card, and congrats card. Each card size varies, extra postage may be required.
Printed on high quality paper stock, Hallmark's eco-friendly greeting cards are made with paper from well-managed forests.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars809 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
